alert.note: Alert for Hardeman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 27 at 7:02PM CDT until October 27 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 701 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles east of Kirkland, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Hardeman County to the northwest and north of Goodlett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
